data.name: Tower and Sword of Succubus Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Music created for and used in Tower and Sword of Succubus.

All music tracks from the game are included in MP3 format.
data.about_the_game:
Music created for and used in Tower and Sword of Succubus.

All music tracks from the game are included in MP3 format.
data.short_description: The ost for the steam version of Tower and Sword Succubus. Made by the Critical Bliss sound team with Ardclaw as the lead composer.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains depictions of graphic sex, in pixel art form. Monsters in the game are capable of non consensual sex with the female, player-controlled protagonist.

Themes in this game include:> Risque outfits, sexual comments and lewd situations
> Full female and male nudity
> Strong language
> Fantasy sexual situations with exaggerated characters
> Various non-vanilla encounters and non-consensual sex featuring humans and monsters
> Mild violence
